messages.msgSnippet: Maybe you can hope that a kid of yours will show interest in carpentry... then, voila... so many projects sitting their so ready to hand. My 4 year old has
messages.messageBody:
"Maybe you can hope that a kid of yours will show
interest in carpentry...
then, voila... so many projects sitting their so ready
to hand."

My 4 year old has already shown ALOT of interst, yet
we'll have to wait til his motor skills catch up to
his ambtition. Then , hes free to remodel the whole
house if he likes!
kERRY

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Laundry Is Fun , was The truth can be   subjective
messages.msgSnippet: ... OK. Good advice. Maybe you can hope that a kid of yours will show interest in carpentry... then, voila... so many projects sitting their so ready to hand.
messages.messageBody:
>Dont do anything drastic, yet. My husband is a
>carpenter, and every part of my house is 1/2 finished.
>He does beautiful work when paid, but here its more of
>a hapless hobby, so beware! I hear this happens to
>lots of women who think they have found the perfect
>tradesman(husband,lol)

OK. Good advice.

Maybe you can hope that a kid of yours will show interest in carpentry...
then, voila... so many projects sitting their so ready to hand.

(Could happen. <g>)

Betsy
